title: Fairy Bound
description: The 3rd and final installment in the Fairy Compacts series.At last, Tammas has his fondest wish--a teaching position in the monastery-school--and he and Aeron have settled into a comfortable life. But their adventures in Faerie come back to haunt them when the girl they rescued from thralldom begins stirring up trouble in town.They're already questioning whether they can truly belong to each other forever. Under the rising threat of discovery or worse, Aeron and Tam wonder if they might lose the home they love so much, too. With everything slipping away, hard choices must be made... before the world makes the choices for them.Fairy Bound contains illustrations by Ruxandra Lache.
author: Katey Hawthorne
